name: From Scratch (rbrnr)
description:
A game made in 72 hours for Playjam 2.

Scratch the cat has forgotten to get their friend Basil the Bunny a birthday gift and decides to build them a chair. Use your tools to build them the best chair of your abilities.

Credits:
- Programming and design by Ryan Brenner (@_rbrnr)
- Art and design by Nova (@lyranova_yt)
- Music by Miguel López (https://soundcloud.com/mlopezgames)
